attributes.action: Fund the birth of a grass roots community football club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in Churchill & Blakedown, Worcestershire to act as a template for all future clubs.
The new club will provide safe and secure facilities for football (and possible other sports) to be played by the surrounding regional community by men, women, children of both sexes from under 8's upwards and also the disabled.
This club will bring together people from all backgrounds to enjoy the wonderful glow that can be achieved from watching and/or participating in sport.
